description: Complete system overview covering the video overlay system architecture, core principles, and high-level component interactions
Detailed documentation of the multi-algorithm perceptual hashing system, including pHash, AverageHash, ColorMomentHash, and MarrHildrethHash implementations
Comprehensive documentation of the Dynamic Time Warping (DTW) implementation for video synchronization, including optimization techniques and frame mapping logic
Detailed documentation of the template matching system for spatial video alignment, including the correlation scoring algorithm and position detection process
Documentation of the end-to-end video processing pipeline, including frame sampling, background adaptation, and audio synchronization logic
